name: Window Manager()
description:
Thank you for trying WindowManager()!

This is my first ever GameJam. I hope you'll like the game. 

PLEASE download the windows version. The post processing is better, and it looks so much better than the html version. Plus, you'll have access to the scoring system.

The controls are:

D: Right

A: Left

You must move the windows around to create a path. Get to the yellow square to get to the next level (there are 5, you can select any of them, but by doing that you'll not be able to use the score system)

I'm sorry if the HTML version works so bad. I know that. I've never developed anything for HTML, so if you're encountering any problems, download the windows version.
